mapper.select: select b.reservation_id review_exists from reservation a left join review_info b on a.reservation_id = b.reservation_id where a.user_id = #{id}

select a.reservation_id, c.stay_name, c.location, date_format(a.check_in_date, '%y.%m.%d') check_in_date, date_format(a.check_out_date, '%y.%m.%d') check_out_date, date_format(d.review_time, '%y.%m.%d') review_time from reservation a join room_info b on a.room_id = b.room_id join stay_info c on b.stay_id = c.stay_id join review_info d on a.reservation_id = d.reservation_id where a.user_id = #{id} and d.review_time is not null
